article_title: 'Down the Twitter hole!' Obamacare creepsters delete 'daddy's little girl' tweet [screenshot] – twitchy.com

article_summary:
Instead, it offered this replacement tweet that promises if you play your cards right, you’ll always be Big Daddy Government’s little girl (shudder):
After being told that its “daddy’s little girl” tweet “maxes out the creep factor,” the tweet was quietly deleted from the feed of @HealthCareGov, the official Twitter account for the Obamacare marketplace.
— Elefante (@Calle_Elefante) July 29, 2014Who says you can’t shame the shameless (or at least make them consider their own creepiness)?
— Freedom Reconnection (@FreedomRecon) July 29, 2014Now they know: Twitchy is forever.
@TwitchyTeam Looks like that tweet went down the Twitterhole!
